UnitInfo.Civilopedia: The ultimate skeletal unit! He can strengthen undead units when he leads them.
A wyrmling is a baby dragon. Requires the cult of the dragon in the city that would train this beast!

Clerics are powerful disciple units capable of healing friendly units, turning undead units and blessing your armies. With life mana, clerics can even grant additional lives to your units expending a life 1 promotion!

Recruits may be purchased during an advanced start to enhance it. Experienced workers (xp>10) may also become recruits at a city. Recruits can hurry production at a city significantly or may be used to upgrade to any type of unit. This allows you to hurry temples and then upgrade to experienced priests in a fast start situation.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Burglars are good at sneaking around acquiring items by various means, using scrolls and making sneak attacks.
Dreadnaughts are the ultimate sea power.

Merchant ships bring in wealth from the high seas. Assign a merchant ship to an ocean tile to bring in income (2% chance per level and movement). Merchant ships bring in more income the further away they are from enemy ships, other merchant ships and the northern and southern edges of the world up to 7 tiles away (competition). They have a random income of 0-(range * 10, up to 70), slightly more every 2 levels. It is possible they will also acquire items in their merchanteering pursuits.
Priests are multi-purpose religious units. Later, they can be upgraded to the more powerful cleric.
